articles.title: Former Boston city councilor sentenced to prison over kickback scheme
articles.description:
Tania Fernandes Anderson addressed the judge, asking for forgiveness from her family and constituents.

The post Former Boston city councilor sentenced to prison over kickback scheme appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Former city councilor Tania Fernandes Anderson sentenced to prison for kickback scheme.
Anderson pleaded for forgiveness from her family and constituents during sentencing.
Her conviction highlights ongoing corruption issues affecting Boston's local governance.

articles.title: Medical examiner: Haverhill man’s death while restrained by police was homicide
articles.description:
Seven officers in Haverhill were put on paid leave after the handcuffed man became unresponsive and died.

The post Medical examiner: Haverhill man’s death while restrained by police was homicide appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Medical examiner ruled Haverhill man's death a homicide while restrained by police.
Seven Haverhill officers placed on paid leave following the incident on September 5, 2025.
The ruling raises concerns about police practices and accountability in the Boston area.

articles.title: Tom Brady ‘was supposed’ to play for Raiders upon leaving Patriots, Las Vegas owner Mark Davis said
articles.description:
"The head coach and general manager decided they wanted to go in a different direction."

The post Tom Brady ‘was supposed’ to play for Raiders upon leaving Patriots, Las Vegas owner Mark Davis said appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mark Davis revealed Tom Brady was expected to join the Raiders after leaving the Patriots.
Raiders' head coach Jon Gruden and GM opted for a different direction instead of Brady.
This decision influenced Boston fans' expectations for Brady's post-Patriots career.

articles.title: 5 must-watch movies & TV shows streaming right now
articles.description:
The best of what's new streaming on Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max, Disney Plus, and more.

The post 5 must-watch movies & TV shows streaming right now appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Discover five new streaming titles available on major platforms for Boston residents.
Highlights include popular shows on Netflix, Hulu, and HBO Max as of September 5, 2025.
Local viewers can enhance their entertainment options with these trending selections.
